description: This file defines the KeycloakUserService class, which provides methods to create, update, and retrieve user data from Keycloak within the internet banking application.

classes.name: KeycloakUserService
classes.description: Service class providing CRUD operations for Keycloak users, integrating Spring and Lombok annotations.

methods.name: createUser
methods.description: Creates a new user in Keycloak using the provided UserRepresentation object, returning the HTTP response status.

methods.name: updateUser
methods.description: Updates an existing user in Keycloak identified by the UserRepresentation's ID.

methods.name: readUserByEmail
methods.description: Searches for users in Keycloak by email address, returning a list of UserRepresentation objects.

methods.name: readUser
methods.description: Retrieves user details from Keycloak by user ID, throwing EntityNotFoundException if not found.
